Method Detail

getNodeFactory

public NodeFactory getNodeFactory(String type)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Returns the NodeFactory for the given node type. If no factory has been specified (via GraphFactory.addNodeFactory(String, NodeFactory)), a default factory may be returned.

Specified by:
getNodeFactory in interface GraphFactory
Parameters:
type - The node type
Returns:
A node factory for the given type. If no factory has been specified for the given type, a default node factory may be returned.

addType

public void addType(String type,
                    Class<? extends Node> clazz)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Adds the type to the GraphFactory for this engine. Specifies what class will be used for a given node type, when loading process definitions from XML file.

Specified by:
addType in interface GraphFactory
Parameters:
type - The type identifier, as used in the process definition file
clazz - The node class which will be instantiated for this type

addGlobalCustomType

public void addGlobalCustomType(String type,
                                Class<? extends CustomNode> nodeClass)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Adds the type to the GraphFactory for this engine. Specifies what class will be used for a given node type, when loading process definitions from XML file.

Adds a class for a custom node type globally, for all GraphFactory instances. Only custom types can have global instances, since they are backend agnostic.

Specified by:
addGlobalCustomType in interface GraphFactory
Parameters:
type - The type identifier, as used in the process definition file
nodeClass - The custom node class which will be instantiated for this type

addNodeFactory

public void addNodeFactory(String type,
                           NodeFactory nodeFactory)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Allows custom loading logic to be used to create nodes of a specific type.

Specified by:
addNodeFactory in interface GraphFactory
Parameters:
type - The node type, as used in the process definition XML file
nodeFactory - The factory used to create nodes of this type

newNodeToken

public NodeToken newNodeToken(GraphProcess process,
                              Node node,
                              List<ArcToken> parents)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Generates a new NodeToken for the given GraphProcess, pointing to the given Node.

Specified by:
newNodeToken in interface GraphFactory
Parameters:
process - The GraphProcess which the new NodeToken will belong to
node - The Node the new NodeToken is being placed on
parents - The list of ArcTokens which preceded this NodeToken
Returns:
A new NodeToken
